sections.summary: chef with 12 years of experience cooking in high pace restaurant environments. prior work as prep cook, line chef, and sous chef. energetic culinary professional with a blend of creativity, passion for food and exceptional cooking skills. works well as a dynamic leader in high-pressure settings. highlights focused and disciplined focus on portion and cost control high volume production capability inventory management familiarity well-tuned palette bilingual (english/[other language])
